full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RNAM RTOG GI BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,('DIR LTAR RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BGYIS PA 'DI NI, ,@013B 'JAM DBYANGS DGONG MA'I RGYAL PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI BLON PO RIN PO CHE, ,TSE RIGS NI STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA CHING GIS RIGS BYUNG BA, ,JANG JONG CHING PO CHING WANG GIS SRAS LNGA PA, ,BSTAN SRID KYI RIG PA DANG LDAN PA KUN RGYAL TSAN RDO RJE AER KHA AA HAS DANG, ,GSO RTZI'I RIG PA'I BLO GROS RGYAS PA AA CHE THU DAR HAN THO YON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR ZHES BYAS GNYIS KA'ANG, ,NAN TAN CHEN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO KHRAL DU, ,KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHA CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, ,NYON MONGS KYI BRAN DU 'KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, ,SA SKYA PAN CHEN GYIS LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA YON NA, ,DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, ,BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS SKYES BU'I SKU TSE RGYAL MTSAN @014A *, ,BRTAN PA DANG, ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA PO SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS BSKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI PHYI NANG GI BGEGS DANG 'BRAL NAS PHAN PA DANG BDE BA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
